name: Study: Effects of Player-Type Driven Game Design on Player Experience
name_original: Study: Effects of Player-Type Driven Game Design on Player Experience
description:
As part of my master's thesis, I am conducting a study to investigate how player-type driven game design influences the player experience and how this impacts their performance, motivation and engagement.  Therefore I modified the already existing game "Octarina" to get a better insight on the player's behaviour. The study consists of a questionnaire and 6 different levels. 

If you could take some time to participate in my study, it would help me a lot!
